init

await Select a branch
snapshot
cmp stdout prompt

feed wt1
await
snapshot
cmp stdout filter

feed <Enter>

-- home --
/home/user
-- worktree --
/home/user/main
-- branches --
[
  {"branch": "main", "worktree": "/home/user/main"},
  {"branch": "feat1", "base": "main", "worktree": "/home/user/wt1"},
  {"branch": "feat2", "base": "feat1", "changeID": "#456", "worktree": "/tmp/wt2"},
  {"branch": "feat3", "base": "main"},
  {"branch": "feat4", "base": "feat3", "changeID": "#789", "worktree": "/home/user/main"}
]
-- prompt --
Select a branch:
  ┏━■ feat2 (#456) [wt: /tmp/wt2] ◀
┏━┻□ feat1 [wt: /home/user/wt1]
┃ ┏━□ feat4 (#789)
┣━┻□ feat3
main
-- filter --
Select a branch:
feat1 [wt: /home/user/wt1] ◀
-- want --
feat1
